description:
The Alp Mate Mid is developed for mountain enthusiasts looking for a reliable and comfortable mid-cut hiking and backpacking. It has a high-quality suede upper backed with a waterproof, breathable membrane that keeps the weather out and is fast drying. For additional breathabilty, the tongue and ankle inserts are constructed using a robust mesh fabric. And the rubber toe cap and heel stabilizer provide additional protection and stability for your feet.

Built for comfort:
This boot is built to provide comfort for hiking activities and features the SALEWA® 3F System for flexibility, heel support and a stable, protective fit. Inside, the durable EVA midsole enables a soft landing and superior shock absorption even on rugged ground. In addition, the climbing lacing and adaptive eyelets adjust easily to give greater precision in technical terrain.

Hiking-specific outsole:
Underfoot, the hiking-specific POMOCA® outsole has a lug pattern studied to give stability, grip and traction, and to support natural movement both on and off the trail.

The Alp Mate Mid is a reliable, waterproof solution for long 3-season, alpine hiking session and backpacking trips.
name: Salewa Alp Mate Mid PTX - Mens

specs.value: 3F System with Kevlar® Cables, Mesh, Stretch fabric, Suede 1,.4-1.6 mm
